text: The Copa del Generalísimo 1960 Final was the 58th final of the King's Cup. The final was played at Santiago Bernabéu Stadium in Madrid, on 26 June 1960, being won by Club Atlético de Madrid, who beat Real Madrid 3–1. ==Details== {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"|Atlético de Madrid: |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||1 || Edgardo Madinabeytia |- |DF ||2|| Feliciano Rivilla |- |DF ||3|| Alberto Callejo |- |DF ||4|| Alvarito |- |MF ||5|| Ramiro |- |MF ||6|| Chuzo |- |FW ||7|| Polo |- |FW ||8|| Adelardo Rodríguez |- |FW ||9|| Miguel Jones |- |FW ||10|| Joaquín Peiró |- |FW ||11|| Enrique Collar (c) |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| José Villalonga |} |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align=center |colspan="4"|Real Madrid: |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| |- |GK ||1|| Rogelio Domínguez |- |DF ||2|| Pantaleón |- |DF ||3|| José Emilio Santamaría |- |DF ||4|| Miché |- |MF ||5|| José María Vidal |- |MF ||6|| José María Zárraga (c) |- |FW ||7|| Chus Herrera |- |FW ||8|| Luis del Sol |- |FW ||9|| Alfredo Di Stéfano |- |FW ||10|| Ferenc Puskás |- |FW ||11|| Francisco Gento |- |colspan=4|Manager: |- |colspan="4"| Miguel Muñoz |- |} |} ==See also== *Madrid derby ==References== 1960 Copa Category:Real Madrid CF matches Category:Atlético Madrid matches Category:Madrid Derby matches
title: 1960 Copa del Generalísimo Final
